org.opendaylight.controller.samples.loadbalancer

Interface IConfigManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigManager, LoadBalancerService

    public interface IConfigManager
    Interface implemented by the configuration manager.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllVIPs

        java.util.Set<VIP> getAllVIPs()
        Return all existing VIPs
        Returns:
        Set of VIP's if there is no VIP, it will return empty set.

      • vipExists

        boolean vipExists(java.lang.String name)
        Check if VIP with the 'name' exists
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the VIP
        Returns:
        true if exists false else

      • vipExists

        boolean vipExists(VIP vip)
        Check if VIP exists with the details 'VIP'
        Parameters:
        vip - Search for this VIP
        Returns:
        true if exists false else

      • vipExists

        boolean vipExists(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String ip,
                java.lang.String protocol,
                short protocolPort,
                java.lang.String poolName)
        Check if VIP with the provided details exists
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the VIP
        ip - IP of the VIP
        protocol - IP Protocol of the VIP (TCP/UDP)
        protocolPort - Transport port of the VIP (e.g 5550)
        poolName - Name of the pool attached with the VIP
        Returns:
        true if exists false else

      • createVIP

        VIP createVIP(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String ip,
            java.lang.String protocol,
            short protocolPort,
            java.lang.String poolName)
        Add VIP to the configuration
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the VIP
        ip - IP of the VIP
        protocol - IP Protocol of the VIP (TCP/UDP)
        protocolPort - Transport port of the VIP
        poolName - Name of the pool that VIP will use for load balancing its traffic
        Returns:
        Newly created VIP

      • getVIPAttachedPool

        java.lang.String getVIPAttachedPool(java.lang.String name)
        Return pool attached to VIP
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the VIP
        Returns:
        Name of the pool attached to VIP else null

      • updateVIP

        VIP updateVIP(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String poolName)
        Update pool name of the VIP.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the VIP
        poolName - Attach this pool to VIP
        Returns:
        Updated VIP If successful null If this VIP is already attached to any existing pool.

      • deleteVIP

        VIP deleteVIP(java.lang.String name)
        Delete the VIP
        Parameters:
        name - Delete VIP with this name
        Returns:
        Details of the deleted VIP

      • memberExists

        boolean memberExists(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String poolName)
        Check if pool member with the 'name' present in the pool with name 'poolName'
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the pool member
        poolName - Name of the pool, you want to search for pool member
        Returns:
        true If exist false else

      • memberExists

        boolean memberExists(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String memberIP,
                   java.lang.String poolName)
        Check if pool member with name 'name' and IP 'memberIP' exist in the pool 'poolName'
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the pool member
        memberIP - IP of the pool member
        poolName - Name of the pool member you want to search
        Returns:
        true If Exist false else

      • getAllPoolMembers

        java.util.Set<PoolMember> getAllPoolMembers(java.lang.String poolName)
        Return all pool members of the pool 'poolName'
        Parameters:
        poolName - Name of the pool
        Returns:
        Set of all the pool members if pool with the name present in the configuration null else
